meanings.definition: Full of or covered with lumps
meanings.sent1: The mashed potatoes were lumpy and unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: She felt the lumpy texture of the old mattress.
meanings.sent3: The lumpy gravy looked like a bumpy road on her plate.
meanings.sent4: The lumpy terrain of the moon made walking difficult for the astronauts.
meanings.sent5: The lumpy pillow gave him a sore neck in the morning.

meanings.sent1: Her lumpy sweater kept her warm in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent2: The soup had a lumpy consistency that was not appetizing.
meanings.sent3: The lumpy rug made it hard for the chair to stay steady.
meanings.sent4: The lumpy batter made the pancakes unevenly cooked.
meanings.sent5: The lumpy gravy clung to the spoon in thick globs.

meanings.sent1: The lumpy oatmeal was not very appealing for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The paint had dried into a lumpy mess on the palette.
meanings.sent3: The lumpy milkshake was difficult to drink through a straw.
meanings.sent4: The lumpy sugar in the bowl refused to dissolve in the tea.
meanings.sent5: The lumpy batter made the cake rise unevenly in the oven.
